data.text: @vonbrauckmann its a substandard vaccine, entire US population is market for these vaccine makers
@vonbrauckmann Apt. Indians have a different genetic makeup. Local trials are important.

@kinjalpatelguj @vonbrauckmann Apparently not many Asian were involved in the trial phase. Only 4% of its phase III study involved Asains, which means even less Indians and also it showed only 74% efficacy in Asians as compared to 90% in others.
https://t.co/Kn3tFKfWPS
@vonbrauckmann Why should India want a much more expensive vaccine when it has 2 of it's own. Makes no sense.

@vonbrauckmann Going deep into a problem and understanding any problem is the name of the game; think 3-D, even in politics. If Kissinger would have understood Pakistan in 1960 he would not have made friendship with Pakistan.
@vonbrauckmann Why don’t ask for local trial ?

@vonbrauckmann You are correct sir. ICI  3 Pharma companies have been in India since the British raj. ICI Pharma jettisoned from the main company and joined with Astra of Sweden to form Astrazenca. Last 100 years vaccines have been made. Dr. Reddy labs is manufacturing Russian vaccine.
@vonbrauckmann Thank God. I really dont want the mRNA experiment done in India.

@vonbrauckmann Hope Pfizer would have made payments to so called experts who were deriding Indian vaccines and rooting for imported ones.
